Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards. This exceptional item not only boasts a wide range of features but also stands out with its unique design and superior quality. We believe in delivering the best value to our customers, and I'm confident that this product will exceed your expectations. Considering its exceptional craftsmanship and benefits, I'm extending an exclusive offer to you for $125. This price reflects the true value of the product and includes a special warranty for your peace of mind. I hope you'll find this offer compelling and look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $125. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $125
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
